content.description:
Approach: By boat on Apache Lake, anchor near Friendship Cove and scramble and bushwack your way up to the base of the tower.  Watch for rattlesnakes.  Approximately 1 hour. 

  Climb: Climb the crumbling chimney system (95 feet) to reach the top of the tower and the anchors.  Watch for loose rock the entire climb!  Beautiful summit. 

  Descent: Rap the route from 3 bolt anchors.  Make your way back to the lake.
content.protection: Singles - .5 to 3 or 4.    3 bolt anchor at top.
content.location: Apache Lake - near Friendship Cove.  You can see the tower from many places on the water.

content.description: Just a temp holding spot for this route until we can get an Apache Lake page created and move it there.
